hero.title: Track-based learning, module by module.
hero.subtitle: Each track is broken down into focused modules with clear outcomes and time guidance.

modules.title: Module 0 - Git & GitHub Basics
modules.description: Learn essential Git commands and collaborative workflows using GitHub.

modules.title: Module 0 - Frontend Basics
modules.description: Understand core frontend concepts including HTML, CSS, and basic React fundamentals.

modules.title: Module 1 - Next.js
modules.description: Build modern web applications using Next.js with routing, layouts, and static rendering.

modules.title: Module 2 - ShadCN
modules.description: Create consistent and accessible UI using ShadCN and Tailwind CSS.

modules.title: Module 3 - React Hook Form
modules.description: Handle complex forms with validation and performance optimization.

modules.title: Module 4 - TanStack Query
modules.description: Manage server state efficiently with caching, mutations, and async data flows.

modules.title: Module 0 - Basic React Native and Expo
modules.description: Learn the fundamentals of building cross-platform mobile apps with Expo.

modules.title: Module 1 - Build a Mobile Todo App
modules.description: Apply React Native concepts by building a complete Todo application.

modules.title: Module 0 - Basic C# & .NET
modules.description: Understand C# syntax and the fundamentals of the .NET ecosystem.

modules.title: Module 1 - EF Core & Database
modules.description: Work with relational databases using Entity Framework Core.

modules.title: Module 2 - Database Communication
modules.description: Implement data access patterns and repository-based communication.

modules.title: Module 3 - Frontend Communication
modules.description: Expose APIs and handle frontend-backend data exchange.

modules.title: Module 4 - Domain Relation
modules.description: Design clean domain models and manage entity relationships.

modules.title: Module 5 - CQRS
modules.description: Apply CQRS to separate read and write responsibilities for scalable systems.

modules.title: Azure Fundamentals - Overview
modules.description: Get a high-level overview of Azure services and cloud architecture concepts.

modules.title: Module 0 - Azure Setup
modules.description: Set up an Azure account and configure the development environment.

modules.title: Module 1 - Azure Introduction
modules.description: Understand core Azure services and how they fit into real-world applications.

modules.title: Module 2 - Deploy to Web App
modules.description: Deploy a web application to Azure App Service using best practices.

modules.title: Module 3 - Deploy to SQL Database
modules.description: Provision and connect an Azure SQL Database for production workloads.

modules.title: Module 4 - Automate Web App Deployment (CI/CD)
modules.description: Automate build and deployment pipelines using Azure CI/CD workflows.

modules.title: Module 5 - Azure Key Vault
modules.description: Secure secrets and configuration using Azure Key Vault.
